sourcesContent:
import React, {Fragment} from 'react' import { withRouter, NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import TextField from '@material-ui/core/TextField'; import Autocomplete from '@material-ui/lab/Autocomplete'; import Player from '@vimeo/player'; import WrapperConsumer from '../store'; import '../assets/css/style.css'; import '../assets/css/index.css'; import Header from './HeaderComponent'; import Footer from './FooterComponent'; import { getFunctions } from '../services/functions' class IndexComponent extends React.Component{ constructor(props) { super(props); this.myRef = React.createRef(); } state = { showVideo: false, functions : [], activeTab : 1 } getAllFunctions = async (e) => { var functions = await getFunctions() if(functions && functions.categories){ functions = functions.categories functions = functions.map((option) => { const category = option.label[0].toUpperCase(); return { category: /[0-9]/.test(category) ? '0-9' : category, ...option, }; }); this.setState({ functions: functions }) } } componentDidMount(){ //const {user, dispatch} = this.props.context this.getAllFunctions() } showVideo (val){ this.setState({showVideo: val}) const iframe = this.myRef.current const player = new Player(iframe); if (val === true) {player.play(); player.setCurrentTime(0) } else player.pause() } goFunction = (f) => { //console.log(f) this.props.history.push("/functions") } changeTab(tab) { setTimeout(()=>{ this.setState({activeTab : tab}) },300) } render(){ //const {context:{user, dispatch}} = this.props; const functionsOptions = this.state.functions return(
this.showVideo(false)} className="aog-close-1 w-inline-block">

Oil & Gas Professionals | Tradesperson?

Work your way
option.category} getOptionLabel={(option) => option.label} style={{ width: '100%' }} onChange={(event, newValue) => { this.goFunction(newValue) }} renderInput={(params) => } />
Build your profile
On-Demand Jobs
On-Demand Service Providers
this.showVideo(true)} className="aoa-videobutton-1 w-inline-block">

The OGHelp Process

this.changeTab(1)}>
1. Sign up!
 this.changeTab(2)}>
2. Review Matching Jobs
 this.changeTab(3)}>
3. Submit Proposal
 this.changeTab(4)}>
4. Perform Work
 this.changeTab(5)}>
5. Send Invoices
 this.changeTab(6)}>
6. Get Paid!
1. Sign Up
Oil & Gas professionals, consultants and companies can provide their services by Signing Up as a Service Provider. If you are looking to get your jobs done and collaborate with industry experts you will soon be able to sign up as a Client.
Become a service provider
2. Review Matching Jobs
You will be able to review and track posted jobs that match your skills and functions.
Become a service provider
3. Submit Proposal
You will be able to submit proposals for your matching jobs and win jobs! You will also be able to collaborate with other Oil & Gas professionals and experts on bigger jobs.
Become a service provider
4. Perform Work
As you perform the work, you can send updates, communicate and manage the job with the client, directly on OGhelp.
Become a service provider
5. Send Invoices
As you perform work on your jobs, you can submit invoices. OGhelp will help you manage all of your jobs and track all the work you have done so you can focus on getting your jobs done!
Become a service provider
6. Get Paid!
As you complete work, submit invoices and get paid, OGhelp will help you manage all your transactions, including transfer of funds to your bank account, safely and securely.
Become a service provider

Join Our Growing Professionals Community

this.showVideo(true)} className="aoe-videobutton-1 w-inline-block">

); } } export default withRouter(WrapperConsumer(IndexComponent));
